A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The whole fade away Jedi deaths were never satisfying. Obi Wan's was especially egregious in an otherwise lovely film. Then Yoda and we kind of had to accept that but it didn't fix Obi Wan's pointless\, needless death. And now this. This is unacceptable. The man had so much more to offer in life. As if Obi Wan's futile\, meaningless death all over again. I was never more done with Star Wars than I am today.
